1. Core Classes

Bounding Volumes

gstBoundedHapticObjBase class for haptic objects that utilize a bounding volume.
gstBoundingBoxRepresents a box aligned with the x, y, and z axis which contains a volume of space.
gstBoundingCubeRepresents a cube aligned with the x, y, and z axis which contains a volume of space.
gstBoundingSphereRepresents a bounding sphere.
gstBoundingVolumeGHOST Class to inherit from to define bounding volumes An instance of this class is pointed to by the gstBoundedHapticObj.
gstTransformedBoundingBoxA class that implements a bounding box bounding volume implementation for use by the PHANToM.
gstTransformedBoundingSphereA class that implements a bounding sphere bounding volume implementation for use by the PHANToM.
getBoundingRadiusHelper function for getting the radius of the bounding sphere instance associated with the haptic object.
setBoundingCenterHelper function for setting the center of the bounding volume instance associated to the haptic object.
setBoundingDimensionsHelper function for setting the x-axis length of the bounding box instance associated with the haptic object.
setBoundingRadiusHelper function for setting the radius of the bounding sphere instance associated with the haptic object.
